subject: Organized Labor
Football
Collective Bargaining
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: The lockout would only end after the full union votes in favor of the collective bargaining agreement, although the doors of N.F.L. facilities could open conditionally before then.
snippet: The lockout would only end after the full union votes in favor of the collective bargaining agreement, although the doors of N.F.L. facilities could open conditionally before then.
